content:
Just a test article to see if things are working # I just realised I suck at this and I have an overthinking problem. At first atleast for 2,3 hrs I couldnt understand anything of what was going on in this codebase, even reading the documents didn’t help much. It was only when I took a break and saw the docs calmly was I able to make sense of it, wow! anyways here’s the two docs that got me going from creator and official docs.
After all is said and done I actually ended up quite liking this theme, but I need to move on now this has taken almost 3 days to get up 🤧
summary: This is my first post on my site
title: My first post

title: Rogue-One

content: Hi! I'm Harshit I'm currently an undergrad student in IIIT Naya Raipur. I'm interested in blockchain, web-dev, Unreal Engine and a bit in AI. Anyways I'll try to write blogs and reviews here and about my personal projects. I also play guitar (atleast I try to) and I like video games and movies. Yeah that’s pretty much it…
title: About Me
